snippet: India overreacted in canceling peace talks between the two countries. They should plan to meet and talk at the United Nations in New York next month.
abstract: Editorial contends that Indian Prime Min Narendra Modi fumbled early test of leadership by canceling high-level meeting with Pakistan; asserts that cancellation was overreaction to border violations in Kashmir; calls for both Modi and Pakistani Prime Min Nawaz Sharif to meet and establish continuing dialogue.
lead_paragraph: India overreacted in canceling peace talks between the two countries. They should plan to meet and talk at the United Nations in New York next month.

headline.main: Prime Minister Modi Fumbles on Pakistan
headline.print_headline: Prime Minister Modi Fumbles on Pakistan
